languages.text: {n}Железный шлем намертво прикипел к плоти еретички. Во тьме за прутьями маски не разглядеть ее лица, но, когда вы вглядываетесь туда чуть дольше, чем стоило бы, вам кажется, что там что-то шевелится... всего на мгновение.{/n}

{n}The iron helmet is firmly attached to the heretic's flesh. Her face is impossible to make out in the darkness behind the bars of her mask, but after peering at it for a little longer than necessary, you wonder if, for a moment... you saw something move.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Железный шлем намертво прикипел к плоти еретички. Во тьме за прутьями маски не разглядеть ее лица, но, когда вы вглядываетесь туда чуть дольше, чем стоило бы, вам кажется, что там что-то шевелится... всего на мгновение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The heretic's iron helmet is baked firmly into her flesh. Her face is impossible to make out in the darkness behind the bars of her mask, but after peering into it for a little longer than necessary, you wonder if, for a moment there... you saw something move.{/n}

{n}The heretic's iron helmet is baked firmly into her flesh. Her face is impossible to make out in the darkness behind the bars of her mask, but after peering into it for a little longer than necessary, you wonder if, for a moment there... you saw something move.{/n}

{n}The iron helmet is firmly attached into the heretic's flesh. Her face is impossible to make out in the darkness behind the bars of her mask, but after peering into it for a little longer than necessary, you wonder if, for a moment there... you saw something move.{/n}

{n}The iron helmet is firmly attached into the heretic's flesh. Her face is impossible to make out in the darkness behind the bars of her mask, but after peering into it for a little longer than necessary, you wonder if, for a moment there... you saw something move.{/n}

{n}The iron helmet is firmly attached to the heretic's flesh. Her face is impossible to make out in the darkness behind the bars of her mask, but after peering at it for a little longer than necessary, you wonder if, for a moment... you saw something move.{/n}

{n}The iron helmet is firmly attached to the heretic's flesh. Her face is impossible to make out in the darkness behind the bars of her mask, but after peering at it for a little longer than necessary, you wonder if, for a moment... you saw something move.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Eisenhelm ist fest mit dem Fleisch der Ketzerin verbunden. Ihr Gesicht lässt sich in der Dunkelheit hinter den Gittern ihrer Maske unmöglich ausmachen. Nachdem du aber etwas länger als nötig hineingestarrt hast, fragst du dich, ob du nicht doch kurz ... eine kleine Bewegung gesehen hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The iron helmet is firmly attached to the heretic's flesh. Her face is impossible to make out in the darkness behind the bars of her mask, but after peering at it for a little longer than necessary, you wonder if, for a moment... you saw something move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Eisenhelm ist fest mit dem Fleisch der Ketzerin verbunden. Ihr Gesicht lässt sich in der Dunkelheit hinter den Gittern ihrer Maske unmöglich ausmachen. Nachdem du aber etwas länger als nötig hineingestarrt hast, fragst du dich, ob du nicht doch kurz ... eine kleine Bewegung gesehen hast.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le masque de fer est fermement fixé au visage de l'hérétique. Son visage est impossible à discerner dans l'obscurité derrière les barres de son masque, mais après avoir regardé un peu plus longtemps que nécessaire, vous vous demandez si, l'espace d'un instant, vous n'avez pas vu quelque chose bouger.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The iron helmet is firmly attached to the heretic's flesh. Her face is impossible to make out in the darkness behind the bars of her mask, but after peering at it for a little longer than necessary, you wonder if, for a moment... you saw something move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le masque de fer est fermement fixé au visage de l'hérétique. Son visage est impossible à discerner dans l'obscurité derrière les barres de son masque, mais après avoir regardé un peu plus longtemps que nécessaire, vous vous demandez si, l'espace d'un instant, vous n'avez pas vu quelque chose bouger.{/n}

languages.text: {n}铁制面具牢牢嵌在这个异端分子的血肉之中。在这一片黑暗之中，你无法透过面具的孔洞认出她的脸。但你凝视面具一段时间之后，有那么一瞬间，你觉得你好像看到面具下面……有什么东西在动。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The iron helmet is firmly attached to the heretic's flesh. Her face is impossible to make out in the darkness behind the bars of her mask, but after peering at it for a little longer than necessary, you wonder if, for a moment... you saw something move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}铁制面具牢牢嵌在这个异端分子的血肉之中。在这一片黑暗之中，你无法透过面具的孔洞认出她的脸。但你凝视面具一段时间之后，有那么一瞬间，你觉得你好像看到面具下面……有什么东西在动。{/n}

languages.text: {n}鉄の兜は異端者の肉体にしっかりと固定されている。女の顔は、仮面の鉄格子の向こうにあり、暗く判別することはできない。無理に長く覗き込んでいると、一瞬その奥で…何かが動いたような気がした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The iron helmet is firmly attached to the heretic's flesh. Her face is impossible to make out in the darkness behind the bars of her mask, but after peering at it for a little longer than necessary, you wonder if, for a moment... you saw something move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}鉄の兜は異端者の肉体にしっかりと固定されている。女の顔は、仮面の鉄格子の向こうで暗く判別することはできないが、無理に長く覗き込むと、一瞬そこに…何かが動いたような気がした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El casco de hierro está firmemente sujeto a la carne del hereje. Es imposible distinguir su rostro en la oscuridad tras los barrotes de su máscara, pero después de escudriñarlo un poco más de lo necesario, te preguntas si, por un momento... viste algo moverse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The iron helmet is firmly attached to the heretic's flesh. Her face is impossible to make out in the darkness behind the bars of her mask, but after peering at it for a little longer than necessary, you wonder if, for a moment... you saw something move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El casco de hierro está firmemente sujeto a la carne del hereje. Es imposible distinguir su rostro en la oscuridad tras los barrotes de su máscara, pero después de escudriñarlo un poco más de lo necesario, te preguntas si, por un momento... viste algo moverse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Demir başlık, kâfirin etine sıkı sıkıya geçmiş, âdeta bir olmuşlar. Maskenin parmaklıkları ardında yatan karanlıkta, kadının yüzünü seçmek imkânsız. Ancak uzun süre dik dik baktıktan sonra, bir anlığına... Bir şeyin hareket edip etmediğini merak ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The iron helmet is firmly attached to the heretic's flesh. Her face is impossible to make out in the darkness behind the bars of her mask, but after peering at it for a little longer than necessary, you wonder if, for a moment... you saw something move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Demir başlık, kâfirin etiyle bir olmuş. Maskenin parmaklıkları ardında yatan karanlıkta yüzünü seçmek neredeyse imkânsız... Ancak uzun süre dik dik baktıktan sonra, bir anlığına... Bir şeyin hareket edip etmediğini merak ediyorsun.{/n}
